entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning late this afternoon. 60 percent chance of wet flurries inland early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
